p: Plant height was positively correlated with LA ( r = 0.49), LN ( r = 0.76), BN ( r = 0.63), SD (0.74), FW ( r = 0.85), and SW ( r = 0.89). In addition, FL was significantly negatively correlated with LW ( r = 0.49). LA was positively correlated with the BN ( r = 0.58) and SD (0.58). The LN showed positive correlation with BN ( r = 0.56), SD (0.48), FW ( r = 0.97), and SW ( r = 0.94). BN was significantly positively correlated with FW ( r = 0.57) and SW ( r = 0.65). SD was positively correlated with FW ( r = 0.55), SW ( r = 0.64), Ca content ( r = 0.57), TC content ( r = 0.49), and total protein ( r = 0.55). SLA was significantly positively correlated with POD ( r = 0.51) and PPO ( r = 0.53) activity.
